content: राद्ध {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [राध्-कर्तरि कर्मणि वा क्त] {@--1@} Propitiated, pleased, conciliated. {@--2@} Effected, accomplished, achieved, performed. {@--3@} Dressed, cooked (as food). {@--4@} Prepared. {@--5@} Obtained, got. {@--6@} Successful, fortunate, happy. {@--7@} Perfect in magical power. {@--8@} Fallen to the lot of.
